channel.title: Posts on Terminal

item.title: About
item.description: Introduction During the 4th semester, me and a couple of my friends designed and implemented a computer system on a FPGA board for extra credits in out Computer Architecture course. Our project, named Nessy is a computer system inspired by the NES console. It includes: A CPU compatible with the MOS 6502 instruction set My name is Strahinja. I’m a third year Computer Engineering student at the School of Electrical Engineering, University of Belgrade.
